BIRMINGHAM , Alabama -- Alabama Parrot Rescue holds Parrots in the Park event at Avondale Park .
After problems with bad weather over the past several months , co-founders Art and Steff Davis have been able to hold two events .
The Davis ' have been rescuing parrots and other exotic birds for years .
When owners ca n't care for the birds anymore , Art and Steff take them in , care for them and find them new homes .

The first event brought out a handful of parrot lovers .
It was a cool damp day with rain threatening but people came out to see the birds .
